be opened not just http.', 'Easy HTML form filling.', 'Convenient link parsing and following.', 'Browser history (.back() and .reload() methods).', 'The Referer HTTP header is added properly (optional).', 'Automatic observance of ', '.', 'Automatic handling of HTTP-Equiv and Refresh.', 'Gisle Aas -- [libwww-perl]', 'Jeremy Hylton (and many others) -- [urllib2]', 'Andy Lester -- [WWW::Mechanize]', "Johnny Lee (coincidentally-named) -- MSIE CookieJar Perl code from which
